argument.name: Number
argument.description: Numeric. A variable containing the starting value for the calculator and the resulting value.

argument.name: Width
argument.description: Numeric. The width of the control.

page.discussion: The Calendar Control displays a popup calculator. One or more Calculator controls may appear inside the Format section of a UI_DLG_BOX() or UI_MODELESS_DLG_BOX() function.

section.note: You must not have any space characters in the finished command.
